snippet.title: Phantoms Five for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

You are the bombardier in a jet aircraft in this simulation.

Avoid anti-aircraft strikes and fight dogfights!


What I think:

Well, I know there are people who like this game...that's fine, but I don't!

I find it downright boring and it also has bad controls, which make it even worse. Also, your lock-on (or whatever you want to call it) moves automatically to the right, annoying! And no, you can not stop that.
